title: AssertionError: Unexpected event type at HttpStream.state_wait_for_request_headers: Expected RequestHeaders, got RequestData
body:
Google Omaha updater causes MITM to crash. Also happens with some other Microsoft service as well

```
May 22 03:40:25 proxy mitmdump[28933]: 192.168.1.5:52263: mitmproxy has crashed!
May 22 03:40:25 proxy mitmdump[28933]: Traceback (most recent call last):
May 22 03:40:25 proxy mitmdump[28933]:  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.9/site-packages/mitmproxy/proxy/server.py", line 325, in server_event
May 22 03:40:25 proxy mitmdump[28933]:    for command in layer_commands:
May 22 03:40:25 proxy mitmdump[28933]:  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.9/site-packages/mitmproxy/proxy/layer.py", line 167, in handle_event
May 22 03:40:25 proxy mitmdump[28933]:    command = next(command_generator)
May 22 03:40:25 proxy mitmdump[28933]:  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.9/site-packages/mitmproxy/proxy/layer.py", line 256, in handle_event
May 22 03:40:25 proxy mitmdump[28933]:    yield from self._handle(event)
May 22 03:40:25 proxy mitmdump[28933]:  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.9/site-packages/mitmproxy/proxy/layer.py", line 167, in handle_event
May 22 03:40:25 proxy mitmdump[28933]:    command = next(command_generator)
May 22 03:40:25 proxy mitmdump[28933]:  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.9/site-packages/mitmproxy/proxy/layers/http/__init__.py", line 846, in _handle_event
May 22 03:40:25 proxy mitmdump[28933]:    yield from self.event_to_child(stream, event)
May 22 03:40:25 proxy mitmdump[28933]:  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.9/site-packages/mitmproxy/proxy/layers/http/__init__.py", line 927, in event_to_child
May 22 03:40:25 proxy mitmdump[28933]:    yield from self.register_connection(command)
May 22 03:40:25 proxy mitmdump[28933]:  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.9/site-packages/mitmproxy/proxy/layers/http/__init__.py", line 1036, in register_connection
May 22 03:40:25 proxy mitmdump[28933]:    yield from self.event_to_child(
May 22 03:40:25 proxy mitmdump[28933]:  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.9/site-packages/mitmproxy/proxy/layers/http/__init__.py", line 899, in event_to_child
May 22 03:40:25 proxy mitmdump[28933]:    for command in child.handle_event(event):
May 22 03:40:25 proxy mitmdump[28933]:  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.9/site-packages/mitmproxy/proxy/layer.py", line 128, in handle_event
May 22 03:40:25 proxy mitmdump[28933]:    yield from self.__continue(event)
May 22 03:40:25 proxy mitmdump[28933]:  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.9/site-packages/mitmproxy/proxy/layer.py", line 226, in __continue
May 22 03:40:25 proxy mitmdump[28933]:    yield from self.__process(command_generator)
May 22 03:40:25 proxy mitmdump[28933]:  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.9/site-packages/mitmproxy/proxy/layer.py", line 182, in __process
May 22 03:40:25 proxy mitmdump[28933]:    command = command_generator.send(send)
May 22 03:40:25 proxy mitmdump[28933]:  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.9/site-packages/mitmproxy/proxy/layers/http/__init__.py", line 162, in _handle_event
May 22 03:40:25 proxy mitmdump[28933]:    yield from self.client_state(event)
May 22 03:40:25 proxy mitmdump[28933]:  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.9/site-packages/mitmproxy/proxy/utils.py", line 26, in _check_event_type
May 22 03:40:25 proxy mitmdump[28933]:    raise AssertionError(
May 22 03:40:25 proxy mitmdump[28933]: AssertionError: Unexpected event type at HttpStream.state_wait_for_request_headers: Expected RequestHeaders, got RequestData(stream_id=1, data=b'<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><request protocol="3.0" updater="Omaha" updaterversion="1.3.36.72" shell_version="1.3.33.23" ismachine="1" sessionid="{47D082BB-B7E8-4985-A1E1-99298B139CCA}" installsource="scheduler" requestid="{77CCF9C0-0209-4E5A-AB3A-C46B67850B7E}" dedup="cr" domainjoined="1"><hw physmemory="16" sse="1" sse2="1" sse3="1" ssse3="1" sse41="1" sse42="1" avx="1"/><os platform="win" version="10.0.17763.2803" sp="" arch="x64"/><app appid="{430FD4D0-B729-4F61-AA34-91526481799D}" version="1.3.36.72" nextversion="" lang="" brand="GCEA" client="" installage="974" installdate="5173" cohort="1:9co:" cohortname="Everyone Else"><updatecheck/><ping r="445" rd="5174" ping_freshness="{FB60B66D-C186-4DD3-8959-D7279452561E}"/></app><app appid="{8A69D345-D564-463C-AFF1-A69D9E530F96}" version="88.0.4324.190" nextversion="" ap="x64-stable-statsdef_0" lang="" brand="GCEA" client="" installage="974" installdate="5173" cohort="1:gu:z3f@0.1" cohortname="Stable"><updatecheck/><ping active="1" a="445" r="445" ad="5174" rd="5174" ping_freshness="{AB2C297F-F06C-42F2-A2C0-C9A97365DDA7}"/></app></request>').
```

```
May 30 10:31:29 proxy mitmdump[32855]: 192.168.1.5:62274: mitmproxy has crashed!
May 30 10:31:29 proxy mitmdump[32855]: Traceback (most recent call last):
May 30 10:31:29 proxy mitmdump[32855]:  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.9/site-packages/mitmproxy/proxy/server.py", line 325, in server_event
May 30 10:31:29 proxy mitmdump[32855]:    for command in layer_commands:
May 30 10:31:29 proxy mitmdump[32855]:  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.9/site-packages/mitmproxy/proxy/layer.py", line 167, in handle_event
May 30 10:31:29 proxy mitmdump[32855]:    command = next(command_generator)
May 30 10:31:29 proxy mitmdump[32855]:  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.9/site-packages/mitmproxy/proxy/layer.py", line 256, in handle_event
May 30 10:31:29 proxy mitmdump[32855]:    yield from self._handle(event)
May 30 10:31:29 proxy mitmdump[32855]:  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.9/site-packages/mitmproxy/proxy/layer.py", line 167, in handle_event
May 30 10:31:29 proxy mitmdump[32855]:    command = next(command_generator)
May 30 10:31:29 proxy mitmdump[32855]:  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.9/site-packages/mitmproxy/proxy/layers/http/__init__.py", line 846, in _handle_event
May 30 10:31:29 proxy mitmdump[32855]:    yield from self.event_to_child(stream, event)
May 30 10:31:29 proxy mitmdump[32855]:  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.9/site-packages/mitmproxy/proxy/layers/http/__init__.py", line 927, in event_to_child
May 30 10:31:29 proxy mitmdump[32855]:    yield from self.register_connection(command)
May 30 10:31:29 proxy mitmdump[32855]:  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.9/site-packages/mitmproxy/proxy/layers/http/__init__.py", line 1036, in register_connection
May 30 10:31:29 proxy mitmdump[32855]:    yield from self.event_to_child(
May 30 10:31:29 proxy mitmdump[32855]:  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.9/site-packages/mitmproxy/proxy/layers/http/__init__.py", line 899, in event_to_child
May 30 10:31:29 proxy mitmdump[32855]:    for command in child.handle_event(event):
May 30 10:31:29 proxy mitmdump[32855]:  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.9/site-packages/mitmproxy/proxy/layer.py", line 128, in handle_event
May 30 10:31:29 proxy mitmdump[32855]:    yield from self.__continue(event)
May 30 10:31:29 proxy mitmdump[32855]:  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.9/site-packages/mitmproxy/proxy/layer.py", line 226, in __continue
May 30 10:31:29 proxy mitmdump[32855]:    yield from self.__process(command_generator)
May 30 10:31:29 proxy mitmdump[32855]:  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.9/site-packages/mitmproxy/proxy/layer.py", line 182, in __process
May 30 10:31:29 proxy mitmdump[32855]:    command = command_generator.send(send)
May 30 10:31:29 proxy mitmdump[32855]:  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.9/site-packages/mitmproxy/proxy/layers/http/__init__.py", line 162, in _handle_event
May 30 10:31:29 proxy mitmdump[32855]:    yield from self.client_state(event)
May 30 10:31:29 proxy mitmdump[32855]:  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.9/site-packages/mitmproxy/proxy/utils.py", line 26, in _check_event_type
May 30 10:31:29 proxy mitmdump[32855]:    raise AssertionError(
May 30 10:31:29 proxy mitmdump[32855]: AssertionError: Unexpected event type at HttpStream.state_wait_for_request_headers: Expected RequestHeaders, got RequestData(stream_id=1, data=b'<s:Envelope xmlns:s="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"><s:Body><GetAuthorizationCookie xmlns="http://www.microsoft.com/SoftwareDistribution/Server/SimpleAuthWebService"><clientId>uuidxxxx</clientId><dnsName>hostname.net</dnsName></GetAuthorizationCookie></s:Body></s:Envelope>').`
``
